Workshop Format

SBST20 will be held virtually this year. The format of the workshop will be as follows:

Authors and registered participants

Registered participants will receive a Microsoft Teams link via email. We ask that you be respectful and mute yourself until it is time for Q&A or other discussions.

Non-registered participants

We will also be livestreaming the workshop via Twitch (Twitch link) for the duration of the workshop. Feel free to join our stream and ask questions in the chat if you did not register.

Q & A / Audience participation

We have a general sli.do page for open questions to all. Each paper has an accompanying sli.do link above. You can use these links to post your questions in advance for our authors, or feel free to use either the Teams or Twitch chat for live questions as well!

Recording

Following the workshop, we will make a recording available via YouTube.
